description:
Turn your favourite Petzl headlamp into a lantern with the Noctilight. Doubling as both a carrying case and lantern body, the Noctilight is easy to pack and carry. To use just pop in a compatible Petzl headlamp and switch it on, the diffuser side casts a warm even glow.

  • Control panel allows direct access to the light’s controls
  • Zippered housing is easy to use with or without gloves
  • Integrated elastic cord provides numerous mounting and hanging options
  • Compatible with: all Tikkina, Tikka, Zipka, Actik, Actik Core, Tactikka, Tactikka + and Tactikka +RGB headlamps
name: Petzl Noctilight
